statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (5,-8) and (9,4).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{4}-{\left(-{8}\right)}}}{{{9}-{\left({5}\right)}}}=\frac{{12}}{{4}} which reduces to \displaystyle{3} (if it's not already reduced)
